long_description: Create more living space between 2 NEMO Asashi 4 tents (sold separately) with the Asashi Link(TM). Use the Link as a communal meeting space, a versatile entrance, a sleeping area for pets or covered storage for your wet gear. Featuring dual entrances, a floorless interior and door tie-downs, the Asashi Link gives you unprecedented flexibility when extra space is needed. Adds 33 sq. ft. of space. Overstock.
short_description: Create more living space between 2 NEMO Asashi 4 tents (sold separately) with the Asashi Link(TM).
